findings.description: Module has backend/ but missing facade/ directory
findings.recommendation: Create facade layer to orchestrate business logic. Facade should use repositories via factory pattern. API endpoints should be thin: parse request → call facade → return response.

findings.description: Flask route 'get_logging_mode' is 18 lines (>10 LOC suggests business logic)
findings.recommendation: Extract business logic to Service Layer. Routes should be thin: parse request → call service → return response. See docs/knowledge/cosmic-python-patterns.md for Service Layer pattern.
